answers.answer: Your primary problem is agoraphobia.  That is what you need to tackle first.  Eventually this condition will become life threatening if it hasn't already become so.  There are no doctors on this forum and only a brainless doc would diagnose someone sight unseen anyway.  The liability is just too high.  The forum does not take the place of a doctor's visit.  Again, forget about the other conditions for a minute and explore psychological resources for the agoraphobia.  There is no way around it.

I don't understand why you chose the type 2 diabetic forum to post your concern considering it is not diabetes related. Hmmm....What I don't see mentioned are results from a medical doctor's examination. I suggest you see one as soon as possible for proper treatment.
